page.title: 20 Riding in our area.
page.content: Around our area there are a few stables. The instuctors take the children out and they ride along bridleways,fields and roads. Bridleways are tracks that horses and ponies are allowed to use. Some bridle ways go through fields and they go on for miles. The stables will have 15-30 horses with all different colours and sizes.Many schools have children who help on Saturdays. Around our area you can ride for miles and many young children have their own ponies to ride. Most riding schools charge between Â£2.50 and Â£5.00 for a lesson.Some have little shows,where the children can ride the ponies of their choice and have a chance to win a rossette.
